title: 16A.42 CLAIMS: FORM, APPROVAL, REGISTER.
text:
The commissioner shall prescribe the form of a claim.
If the claim is approved, the commissioner shall issue a payment in the amount of the claim.
[Repealed, 1Sp1985 c 13 s 376]
The commissioner shall enter a payment in the payment register as if it were a cash payment.
If the commissioner determines that a claim is invalid after issuing a warrant, the commissioner may void an unpaid warrant. The commissioner is not liable to any holder who took the void warrant for value.
